title: Jeff Kimbrel's R functions
text: can install development version jakR2 GitHub :

what: Decorate a file string for gfm markdown in Obsidian — file2gfm
title: Decorate a file string for gfm markdown in Obsidian — file2gfm
text: function takes file path returns string file path gfm formatted link works Obsidian. path given, function "expand" file string full path. meant expand "~/" full path, can cause issues give just file name context path.

title: Decorate a file string for gfm markdown in Obsidian — file2gfm
Decorate a file string for gfm markdown in Obsidian — file2gfm
text: file string representing file name path path string representing file path verify Logical indicating whether verify file exists

title: Decorate a file string for gfm markdown in Obsidian — file2gfm
text: string file path gfm markdown link

what: Decorate an Obsidian link for gfm markdown — obs2gfm
title: Decorate an Obsidian link for gfm markdown — obs2gfm
Decorate an Obsidian link for gfm markdown — obs2gfm
Decorate an Obsidian link for gfm markdown — obs2gfm
text: link string representing link text string representing text display

what: Convert an orthogroup list dataframe to a count dataframe — orthogroup_list2counts
title: Convert an orthogroup list dataframe to a count dataframe — orthogroup_list2counts
text: function used convert output read_orthogroups() type set "list" count format. Alternatively, can run verify mode return "counts" "list" based basic inference.

title: Convert an orthogroup list dataframe to a count dataframe — orthogroup_list2counts
Convert an orthogroup list dataframe to a count dataframe — orthogroup_list2counts
text: orthogroups orthogroup dataframe verify TRUE, return "counts" "list" based input
